reference.title: serviced docker
reference.shortdesc: The serviced docker command administers Docker images and registry.

refbody.section:
COMMANDSThe following commands are available for serviced docker:
sync Asynchronously push all images from the serviced Docker registry index into the Docker registry.
reset-registry For upgrades only, download the latest images from the Docker registry and save them into the serviced Docker registry index.
migrate-registry Migrate Docker registry data into another remote registry.
override Replace an image in the Docker registry with a new image
help, h Show a list of commands or the help for a single command.

dlentry.dd: Shows the help for an option.
